"Cloud computing, and specifically Windows Azure, enables banks to move from a capital intensive cost model to one which is based on the consumption of technology," says Steve Ballmer . No longer will banks need to over-order computing resources because the scale of the Azure platform allows high volume workloads such as end-of-day processing to be consumed on demand. Reflecting its strategic importance, the debate over the use of cloud computing in financial services has moved up the agenda at this year's Sibos and has already been the subject of lively early Monday discussion with
